entries.name: Alexander
entries.plainDescription: Read-only local release preflight gate that runs Armory validation commands and reports pass/fail.
entries.flavorLine: A fortress gate that tests your readiness before deployment.

entries.name: Chronicle
entries.plainDescription: Cross-repo git intelligence with branch status, ahead/behind, dirty state, and recent commits.
entries.flavorLine: A living record of every front in your codebase.

entries.name: Remedy
entries.plainDescription: Read-only environment health checker for Armory config, wrappers, scripts, CI files, remotes, and dependencies.
entries.flavorLine: A field medicine kit for your local toolchain.

entries.name: Mognet
entries.plainDescription: Unified notification relay for tool outputs, with channel routing, retries, and digest formatting.
entries.flavorLine: A reliable message network for operational updates.
